title: Social Leadership Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Adaptive Personalized Learning Environments (ALE)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational organizational management and leadership skills, proficiency in digital device utilization
context.additional_context: Aimed at improving social sector expertise for corporate managers/leaders. Conducted through blended learning combining online platforms and offline workshops. Requires flexible learning structures harmonized with learners' work schedules

learning_goals: A personalized ALE (Adaptive Learning Environment) system can be operated with over 90% engagement using the Personalized Learning Design Framework (PLDF).
Social leadership competencies can be enhanced by 30% or more compared to pre-assessment through activity theory-based task performance.
Over 80% of learners achieve target outcomes in the ALE (Adaptive Learning Environment) during summative evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
